greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lower triangular matrix, read by rows: A130296 * A007318, as infinite lower triangular matrices.
comment: The lower triangular matrix A130296 is equal to the restriction of the square array A051340 to its lower left triangular part. So this is also equal to (A051340) * A007318, where (A051340) is the lower triangular part of A051340, i.e., A051340[i,j] replaced by zero for j>i: see  Mathar's Maple code. - _M. F. Hasler_, Aug 15 2015
formula: A130296 * A007318 as infinite lower triangular matrices.
